comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: She was in the field of "scientific homemaking," using the study of efficiency toward better practices in kitchen and appliance design.

comment.author: 78717736@N03
comment._content: Mary Pattison was the President of the New Jersey State Federation of Women’s Clubs, “an organization of fifteen or sixteen thousand women, which believes in doing practical things.” The organization is still around today. From sundaymagazine.org/2011/03/experiment-station-to-solve-ho...
